translations.name: Clear Word Bible
translations.description: The Clear Word, originally published in March 1994 as the Clear Word Bible, is an English-language \\\"devotional paraphrase of the Bible written as a personal devotional exercise by Jack Blanco, former dean of the School of Religion at Southern Adventist University. Though The Clear Word is not officially endorsed by the Seventh-day Adventist Church, it is now being printed by the Review and Herald Publishing Association.

translations.name: Clear Word Bible
translations.description: The Clear Word, originally published in March 1994 as the Clear Word Bible, is an English-language \\\"devotional paraphrase of the Bible written as a personal devotional exercise by Jack Blanco, former dean of the School of Religion at Southern Adventist University. Though The Clear Word is not officially endorsed by the Seventh-day Adventist Church, it is now being printed by the Review and Herald Publishing Association.

translations.name: Jack Blanco
translations.description_short: The Review and Herald Publishing Association is one of two major Seventh-day Adventist publishing houses in North America and is the oldest institution of the Seventh-day Adventist Church.
